target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002400_BARNIER<tab>Ces paroles ainsi que la tournure générale des événements nous ont en effet rappelé une ancienne prophétie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002410_BARNIER<tab>“The end-bearers will come, ushering chaos and calamity. The Final Days descend and devour the very star...”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002410_BARNIER<tab>“Lorsque résonnera sur la terre le nom des partisans de l'apocalypse, du ciel s'abattra l'ultime calamité scellant le destin de la planète.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002420_SHARLAYANCITIZENA<tab>I've never heard this prophecy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002420_SHARLAYANCITIZENA<tab>C'est la première fois que j'entends parler de cette prophétie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002430_SHARLAYANCITIZENB<tab>Is it true? Will all that really happen?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002430_SHARLAYANCITIZENB<tab>Quel funeste présage... Est-ce qu'un désastre va se produire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002440_BARNIER<tab>Calm yourselves. The time is come to speak of the Forum's most sacred duties. But first...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002440_BARNIER<tab>Un peu de patience, mes chers concitoyens. Avant de vous en dire plus, nous devons d'abord dissiper le sortilège par lequel le Conseil a fait vœu de secret.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002450_LEGISLATORA<tab>Give voice to the voiceless. Let bindings be unbound. By unanimous decree, I declare the enchantment broken!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002450_LEGISLATORA<tab>(-Conseillère élézenne-)Par ces mots le sceau du silence je brise,
par ces mots la libre parole j'autorise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002460_BARNIER<tab>Master Leveilleur, if you would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002460_BARNIER<tab>Voilà, nous pouvons désormais dévoiler au grand jour l'objet de notre haute mission. Je vous laisse continuer, Messire Leveilleur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002470_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Very well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002470_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Avec plaisir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002480_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Two hundred and seventy years ago, our forebears began an expedition in the Dravanian hinterlands, in search of a route to access the aetherial sea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002480_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Environ deux cent soixante-dix ans en arrière, nos ancêtres se sont rendus dans l'Arrière-pays dravanien pour explorer la mer des étoiles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002490_FOURCHENAULT<tab>This much is public knowledge. Their findings, however, would become the Forum's most closely guarded secret.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002490_FOURCHENAULT<tab>L'existence de cette expédition est connue de tous, mais ses découvertes ont jusqu'ici été tenues secrètes par le Conseil.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002500_FOURCHENAULT<tab>What those researchers discovered in the hinterlands was not a passage unto the aetherial sea, but the very heart of our star─and Hydaelyn Herself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002500_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Durant leurs recherches, les membres de l'équipe ont fait la rencontre d'Hydaelyn, la volonté de la planète.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002510_FOURCHENAULT<tab>She spoke to them of a calamity that would extinguish all life, and of a means by which we might be spared.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002510_FOURCHENAULT<tab>C'est elle qui a transmis cette prophétie à nos ancêtres. Elle les a prévenus qu'un cataclysme pro<var 16 /var>vo<var 16 /var>que<var 16 /var>rait l'apocalypse sur terre, mais elle leur a aussi offert un espoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002520_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The moon. 'Tis in truth a gargantuan vessel built to serve as sanctuary for Her children and deliver them from this doom.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002520_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Hydaelyn a fait de la lune une arche. Un gigantesque vaisseau aménagé pour accueillir l'humanité, et la mener vers un nouveau monde où s'installer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002530_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Much like <var 1A 02 /var>Nyunkrepf's Hope<var 1A 01 /var> in ages past, it will bear the people of a world in the throes of death to a new home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002530_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Un projet qui n'est pas sans rappeler l'histoire de Nyunkrepf, notre père fondateur, qui a sauvé les siens des raz-de-marée du sixième fléau grâce à son navire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002540_BARNIER<tab>Needless to say, this would be no small undertaking. To facilitate the great work, the Forum has maintained close contact with the servants of Hydaelyn who presently reside on the moon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002540_BARNIER<tab>Depuis cette rencontre avec Hydaelyn, nous avons été en contact à de multiples reprises avec les serviteurs qu'elle a placés sur la lune pour mener son plan à bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002550_BARNIER<tab>Convinced that the foretold end was all but inevitable, we began amassing a wealth of knowledge. Not merely for the betterment of our nation, but in preparation for the journey to come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002550_BARNIER<tab>Le Conseil a toujours pris cette prophétie très au sérieux. Tout en œuvrant au développement de Sharlayan, nous nous sommes préparés à l'éventualité de devoir abandonner la terre un jour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002560_SHARLAYANCITIZENA<tab>You reveal this to us now? By the gods, how long do we have!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002560_SHARLAYANCITIZENA<tab>Si vous nous dites tout ça maintenant... Ça veut dire que la fin du monde est proche<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002570_BARNIER<tab>While we cannot say with certainty, we believe the hour to be nigh. We received a transmission from the moon suggesting as much not long ago.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002570_BARNIER<tab>Nous avons reçu un signal de nos collaborateurs sur la lune, nous prévenant de l'imminence de l'apocalypse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002580_BARNIER<tab>Which is why we must in earnest begin preparations for the great exodus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002580_BARNIER<tab>Nous avons donc décidé de commencer l'évacuation de notre planète, notre “Grand Exode”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002590_BARNIER<tab>For his impressive contributions and the leadership he demonstrated during our withdrawal from Dravania, we have elected Master Leveilleur to oversee this initiative.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002590_BARNIER<tab>Pour avoir fait ses preuves lors de notre migration depuis l'Arrière-pays dravanien, c'est messire Leveilleur qui aura la res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>té de nous guider lors de cette épreuve.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Fellow scribes and scholars. My countrymen. We face a threat of unprecedented scale.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002600_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Enfants de la con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, mes chers compatriotes, nous sommes sur le point de faire face à un cataclysme qui va plonger notre monde dans un chaos sans précédent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>We must challenge the trials before us with composure and conviction if we are to find salvation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002610_FOURCHENAULT<tab>La survie de l'humanité repose sur les épaules de Sharlayan, un terrible poids que nous devrons supporter avec sang-froid, sans faillir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The wisdom of Sharlayan has ever been a shining beacon in the darkness, and so it shall continue to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002620_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Je peux vous assurer avec confiance que notre peuple a la sagesse nécessaire pour mener à bien cette mission ô combien importante.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>It is our solemn charge to see our heritage preserved for future generations. For those who will come after, we will brave a new frontier.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002630_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Il nous faudra pour cela marcher sur les traces de Nyunkrepf, former un équipage soudé pour braver les vagues et traverser la tempête afin de mettre le cap sur une ère nouvelle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002640_BARNIER<tab>Administrative edicts will be relayed to all major institutions ere long. In the meantime, carry on with your duties. With that, I hereby call this assembly to a close.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002640_BARNIER<tab>Notre plan d'action détaillé sera communiqué sous peu aux autorités concernées. Nous vous demandons donc de reprendre vos activités habituelles en attendant de recevoir de nouvelles directives. Merci de votre attention.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002650_ALISAIE<tab>Do you remember what Mother told us when we visited home?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002650_ALISAIE<tab>Alphinaud, tu te souviens de ce que nous a dit maman<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002660_ALISAIE<tab>That it wasn't until after we were born that Father seemed to lose himself in his work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002660_ALISAIE<tab>Notre père ne s'est consacré corps et âme à son travail de membre du Conseil qu'après notre naissance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002670_ALISAIE<tab>If that <var 1A 02 /var>great work<var 1A 01 /var> of his was the evacuation of this star, then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002670_ALISAIE<tab>S'il était responsable de ce projet depuis le début, alors ceux qu'il a tant voulu sauver...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes... It wasn't for his benefit...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, je suis sûr que nous pensons à la même chose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Would you mind waiting here a moment? I wish to speak with Father before we leave.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Si ça ne te dérange pas, je vais m'absenter un moment. Il faut que je parle à mon père...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Take your time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Courage, ça va bien se passer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Keep it civil, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Essayez de ne pas vous disputer, cette fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you. I shan't be long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci. Je te promets de faire de mon mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>I may look daggers at him, but I will neither speak nor draw them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien sûr, je te promets de faire de mon mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002720_ALISAIE<tab>If it's all the same to you, I have a few choice words to share with Father as well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002720_ALISAIE<tab>Je t'accompagne. Moi aussi, j'ai deux mots à lui dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002730_FOURCHENAULT<tab>So. Come to call us cowards and bid us join your fruitless battle against the inevitable?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002730_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Que voulez-vous<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes venus me dire que je dois combattre, au lieu de fuir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nay, we do not object to the Forum's proposal. On the contrary, those who wish to flee have every right to do so.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002740_ALPHINAUD<tab>Non, nous n'avons rien contre le projet du Conseil de Sharlayan. Nous espérons simplement que ceux qui décideront de partir pourront le faire en toute sécurité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger is cooperating with your associates on the moon to ensure that all is ready should evacuation be our only recourse.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger, dont vous vous rappelez cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment, a d'ailleurs choisi de rester sur la lune pour faciliter le lien entre l'équipage de l'arche et Sharlayan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002760_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Then whatever your business, I suggest you be brief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002760_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Et vous, qu'allez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though we cannot boast the boundless wisdom of Sharlayan, we have firsthand knowledge of foreign cultures, and have conversed with no small number of peoples.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Au cours de nos voyages, nos amis et nous avons été au contact d'un grand nombre de personnes et de cultures.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002780_ALPHINAUD<tab>These experiences have taught us fundamental truths that cannot be recorded in any tome, nor charted on any map.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce que nous avons vécu, ce que nous avons appris lors de ces expériences ne se trouve dans aucun livre, sur aucune carte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002790_ALPHINAUD<tab>The beating heart of this planet is its people, many of whom would give anything─even their lives─to protect the lands they love.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002790_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tous ces gens qui consacrent leur vie à construire, à aimer, à protéger, à rêver... Ils font partie intégrante de notre planète.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Many may choose to join you in the end. But what of those unwilling or unable, for whom escape will never be an option? What would you have them do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Et ils ne sont pas seuls. Il y a aussi les habitants de mondes lointains, dont certains nous sont chers... Autant de personnes pour qui il n'y a pas de place sur cette arche.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002810_ALPHINAUD<tab>To ignore the plight of those one might conceivably save is not wisdom, Father. It is indolence.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quand nous pensons à eux, il n'y a pas le moindre doute dans notre esprit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002820_ALPHINAUD<tab>This is why we choose to fight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002820_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous continuerons à nous battre. Que ce soit par les mots ou par les armes, nous nous battrons pour que tout le monde ait droit à un futur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002830_ALISAIE<tab>We'll not ask for your understanding, Father. Only that you don't turn a blind eye to the good we have done. That we can still do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002830_ALISAIE<tab>On ne vous demande pas de nous comprendre, juste de nous regarder.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002840_ALISAIE<tab>We're not children in need of protection. Hold fast to your principles and let the world burn, if it please, but we believe there is still another way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002840_ALISAIE<tab>On ne veut plus entendre qu'on n'est que des enfants, ou que la guerre est pour les sauvages, pas pour les sages...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002850_ALISAIE<tab>And if there is, we will find it. You see if we don't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002850_ALISAIE<tab>Tout ce qu'on veut, c'est que vous nous regardiez voler de nos propres ailes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002860_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Do as you will. Just stay out of our way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002860_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Faites comme bon vous semble, mais ne nous gênez pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>Were he not so consumed with self-righteousness, he might tell you how proud he is of you both.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002870_YSHTOLA<tab>Bravo, vous ne vous êtes pas démontés. Cette fois, je pense que le message est passé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>Bold words call for bold action. And there'll be no turning to your father should plans go awry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002880_ESTINIEN<tab>Après avoir été aussi tranchants, il va falloir assumer. Il ne s'agira pas de rentrer la queue entre les jambes si on s'est trompés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002890_ALISAIE<tab>As if I ever would. So long as there are those who wish to stay and fight for this star, we have to do what we can to help them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002890_ALISAIE<tab>Bien sûr que non<var 1D /var>! Jusqu'au dernier instant, tant qu'il restera des gens qui veulent vivre ici, on fera face à l'apocalypse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002900_THANCRED<tab>And if we're to do that, we'll need to be well rested.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002900_THANCRED<tab>Bon, je crois que tout le monde a mérité une petite pause. On n'a pas lésiné sur les efforts ces derniers temps, et on aura besoin de toutes nos forces pour ce qui nous attend.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002910_THANCRED<tab>Wouldn't you agree? Having triumphed over what we once thought to be the source of all evil, I can think of no one in greater need of at least a dozen winks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002910_THANCRED<tab>Surtout toi, après ton combat contre Zordiarche. Promets-moi que tu vas foncer tout droit dans ta chambre pour te relaxer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002920_ALPHINAUD<tab>Shall we, then? To the annex, to prepare for tomorrow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002920_ALPHINAUD<tab>Un peu de repos ne nous fera pas de mal. Car dès demain, un immense défi nous attend<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002930_ENDSINGER<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002930_ENDSINGER<tab>[grognement monstrueux]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002940_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>A visitor has come knocking at your door. Whoever could it be?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002940_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>On frappe à la porte. Vous entendez une voix familière appeler votre nom...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Qui est venu vous rendre visite<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alphinaud?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alphinaud

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alisaie?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Alisaie

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thancred?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thancred

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>Y'shtola?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>Y'shtola

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>G'raha Tia?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_005_NONE_VOICE<tab>G'raha Tia

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_006_NONE_VOICE<tab>Estinien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_A4_000_006_NONE_VOICE<tab>Estinien

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah. I hope I didn't wake you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bonsoir. J'espère que je ne t'ai pas <var 08 E905 ((réveillée)) ((réveillé)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002960_ALPHINAUD<tab>I pray you will forgive the unannounced visit, but I wished to speak with you before retiring for the night...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tant mieux. Il y a quelque chose dont je voulais absolument te parler avant de dormir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>...About Garlemald, and the time we spent with the people of Tertium.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002970_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est au sujet de notre premier passage à la gare de Tertium, à Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dangerous though it was, I'm glad we had the opportunity to treat with Jullus and Quintus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Malgré tout ce qui s'est passé, je suis heureux d'avoir rencontré Jullus et les autres, et même Quintus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002990_ALPHINAUD<tab>I was worried what might happen after we were collared. If they attempted to restrain you too. If they succeeded...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_002990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais quand j'y repense, je me dis que tu as bien failli finir avec un de ces colliers autour du cou, toi aussi... Et peut-être même pire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once more I put you in harm's way. And for that I must apologize...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003000_ALPHINAUD<tab>Rien de tout cela ne serait arrivé si nous ne t'avions pas <var 08 E905 ((entraînée)) ((entraîné)) /var> là-dedans. Pour ça, je voulais te présenter mes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Or rather...I should thank you. For trusting in me, time and time again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003010_ALPHINAUD<tab>... Oh, et puis non. Si je suis ici, c'est pour te dire à quel point je te suis re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003020_ALPHINAUD<tab>After all our journeys together, I daresay I've used every expression imaginable to convey to you my gratitude. Nevertheless, I hope these words of mine still carry some small weight.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne compte plus le nombre de fois où je t'ai <var 08 E905 ((remerciée)) ((remercié)) /var> pour ce que tu as fait pour moi... Tu dois te dire que je radote, et pourtant c'est toujours sincère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tomorrow our fight continues. Mayhap it would have been better to seek you out after we have true cause for celebration...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Notre combat se poursuivra demain, et c'est sûrement là que les choses sérieuses vont commencer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>But having mustered the courage to stand up to Father and achieve a personal victory of sorts, I wanted to carry on in that spirit before my nerves got the better of me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il est encore tôt pour les messages de gratitude, mais après m'être enfin expliqué avec mon père, je ne voulais pas rater cette occasion de partager ce moment avec toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003050_ALPHINAUD<tab>The hour grows late, and you doubtless tire of my ramblings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003050_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sur ce, je ne vais pas te déranger plus longtemps. Ce ne serait pas correct de ma part de te priver d'une nuit de sommeil amplement méritée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have a letter for Arenvald to finish, but will be off to bed shortly. Sleep well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003060_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pour ma part, je vais écrire à Arenvald avant de me coucher. À demain, mon <var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003070_ALISAIE<tab>Craving a midnight snack, were you? I did consider bringing a few sweets, but decided this wasn't an appropriate occasion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003070_ALISAIE<tab>Hé hé, t'as cru que je te livrais le dîner<var 1D /var>? Désolée, je suis venue les mains vides aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003080_ALISAIE<tab>I couldn't sleep. Had a few things on my mind. I know it's late, so I'll try not to talk your ear off...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003080_ALISAIE<tab>En fait, j'avais envie de parler un peu avec toi, avant de dormir. Pas la peine d'entrer, ça sera pas long.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003090_ALISAIE<tab>It's Zenos. I keep thinking back to Garlemald, when he'd taken control of your body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003090_ALISAIE<tab>J'arrête pas de penser au moment où Zenos a pris possession de ton corps, à Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003100_ALISAIE<tab>An altogether terrifying experience, to say the least. And one that served as a harsh reminder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003100_ALISAIE<tab>Jusqu'à ce que tu reprennes con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, j'ai été envahie d'un sentiment très fort...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003110_ALISAIE<tab>No one─no matter how strong or quick or clever─is invincible. Not even you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003110_ALISAIE<tab>Pour la première fois, j'ai réalisé que toi non plus, tu n'étais pas invulnérable.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003120_ALISAIE<tab>And as much as it might seem at times that you are...one misstep. One mistake...and that's that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003120_ALISAIE<tab>D'habitude, tu franchis toujours tous les obstacles avec une telle aisance... Cette fois, j'ai vraiment eu peur de te perdre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003130_ALISAIE<tab>Which is why, even though I know you've heard it a thousand times before, I'm going to tell you to take better care of yourself. Because you really, really should.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003130_ALISAIE<tab>J'ai besoin que tu me fasses une promesse. Un immense défi nous attend à partir de demain, et je veux absolument que tu prennes soin de <var 1A 02 /var>toi<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003140_ALISAIE<tab>It goes without saying that we're all committed to this fight, but that doesn't mean that we need to throw our lives away. You know how I feel about noble sacrifices.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003140_ALISAIE<tab>Tu dois penser que j'ai du toupet, après tout ce que j'ai dit à mon père... Mais c'est vrai, ce que je souhaite, c'est sauver le plus de monde possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003150_ALISAIE<tab>Right─that's settled! We'll be keeping the acts of gratuitous bravado to a minimum.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003150_ALISAIE<tab>Bon<var 1D /var>! Maintenant que j'ai ta parole, je vais au moins pouvoir dormir sur mes deux oreilles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003160_ALISAIE<tab>When I looked Father in the eye and swore we'd find a way to avert this tragedy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003160_ALISAIE<tab>Au fait, quand j'ai dit à mon père que je voulais qu'il nous regarde voler de nos propres ailes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003170_ALISAIE<tab>It wasn't a promise just for him. It was a promise for you, too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003170_ALISAIE<tab>Ça vaut aussi pour toi, alors n'en rate pas une miette<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003180_THANCRED<tab>Evening. I hoped you hadn't crawled beneath the covers just yet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003180_THANCRED<tab>Désolé de venir te déranger alors que tu te reposais.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003190_THANCRED<tab>If you'll indulge me for a moment, I have a favor to ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003190_THANCRED<tab>En fait, j'ai un service à te demander... Tu veux bien m'écouter un instant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003200_THANCRED<tab>Don't worry. Nothing desperate or dire, if that's what you were wondering. Not yet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003200_THANCRED<tab>Merci<var 1D /var>! Et ne t'en fais pas, il n'y a rien de grave... Enfin, pas encore.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003210_THANCRED<tab>You know, we may have quite literally entered our final days. The ancients went so far as to call it that for a reason.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003210_THANCRED<tab>Personne ne sait ce qui nous attend vraiment, mais j'imagine qu'on va bien devoir faire face à cette fameuse apocalypse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003220_THANCRED<tab>If so, then everything we did for Ryne, for the First...will have been meaningless. And I can't accept that. I just can't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003220_THANCRED<tab>Urianger avait raison... Il est hors de question que j'abandonne Ryne et le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003230_THANCRED<tab>My mind won't allow for the possibility...and that could be a problem. When we're in the thick of it, I don't know if I've got it in me to be pragmatic this time. To run...even if running's the right choice. The only choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003230_THANCRED<tab>Ils occupent mes pensées, et il est fort possible que mon jugement s'en trouve obscurci dans un moment important.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003240_THANCRED<tab>So if you see me turning a blind eye to the harsh reality...beat some sense into me, would you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003240_THANCRED<tab>Si tu en es témoin, n'hésite pas à me secouer, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003250_THANCRED<tab>I trust you and the other Scions with my life, and I'd like to think the feeling is at least occasionally mutual.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003250_THANCRED<tab>Si je m'adresse à toi, c'est parce qu'on se comprend. Même si l'entente entre tous les Héritiers est plus que cordiale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003260_THANCRED<tab>And I'd never forgive myself if my stubbornness put them in danger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003260_THANCRED<tab>Si on se jetait à corps perdu dans une bataille impossible, je m'en voudrais toute ma vie de ne pas avoir été digne de leur confiance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003270_THANCRED<tab>Gods, listen to me. I'm beginning to sound like the father I never had.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003270_THANCRED<tab>Décidément, plus je prends de l'âge, plus je deviens sentimental...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003280_THANCRED<tab>So, can I count on you to keep me in line? I can think of no one else more eminently qualified.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003280_THANCRED<tab>Bon, j'ai ta parole, hein<var 1D /var>? Tu es la seule personne à qui je peux demander ça, alors je compte sur toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003290_THANCRED<tab>Excellent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003290_THANCRED<tab>Très bien, affaire conclue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003300_THANCRED<tab>Now I can breathe a bit easier. Which isn't to say that I will, given what we're up against.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003300_THANCRED<tab>Grâce à toi, j'aurai l'esprit tranquille. Je vais pouvoir me concentrer sur ce que je sais faire le mieux, sans m'inquiéter du reste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003310_THANCRED<tab>Let's keep this little chat our secret. I'd rather not have anyone scolding us for burning the midnight oil.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003310_THANCRED<tab>Maintenant, je veux que tu reprennes des forces. Et surtout, ne parle à personne de notre petit marché, d'accord<var 1D /var>? Bonne nuit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>You're still awake. Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003320_YSHTOLA<tab>Bonsoir<var 1D /var>! J'avais peur que tu te sois déjà <var 08 E905 ((endormie)) ((endormi)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003330_YSHTOLA<tab>Might I trouble you to stand still for a moment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003330_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu veux bien rester immobile un instant<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003340_YSHTOLA<tab>Hmmm. Nothing appears out of the ordinary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003340_YSHTOLA<tab>... Bon, on dirait que tout va bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003350_YSHTOLA<tab>A precautionary measure. You will recall that serving as a vessel for abundant Light in the First very nearly ended poorly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003350_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu n'as pas oublié toute la Lumière que tu as absorbée lorsqu'on était sur le premier reflet, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>In your recent battle on the moon, you were almost certainly exposed to similar, if not greater forces. Fortunately, from what I can see, you and your aether are none the worse for wear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003360_YSHTOLA<tab>Avec des antécédents pareils, je m'inquiétais des con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces de ton combat contre Zordiarche et je voulais en avoir le cœur net.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>Would that Ryne were here to confirm my assessment...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003370_YSHTOLA<tab>Maintenant que Ryne n'est plus avec nous, il n'y a guère que moi pour se soucier de ce genre de chose.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003380_YSHTOLA<tab>To think you actually found yourself in a direct confrontation with Zodiark...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003380_YSHTOLA<tab>Je n'arrive toujours pas à réaliser que tu as affronté Zordiarche en face à face... Je sais bien qu'il n'y avait pas le choix, mais quand même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>As if Zenos gallivanting about in your body was not misfortune enough. Did you so grossly offend every single deity in a past life that they saw fit to place a curse upon your soul?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003390_YSHTOLA<tab>Sans oublier Zenos qui a pris possession de ton corps avant ça... Je vais finir par croire qu'il y a une terrible malédiction qui pèse sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, that was in poor taste. I recall vividly how battered and broken it was in the depths of Amaurot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003400_YSHTOLA<tab>Plus sé<var 16 /var>rieu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, ton âme était déjà bien mal en point lorsque nous avons visité Amaurote, sur le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Would that you could have seen it with your own eyes. Mayhap then you would understand why the greater part of me is glad you did not. It was...a horror beyond description.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003410_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu te dis sûrement que j'en fais des tonz, mais c'est la vérité<var 1D /var>! J'aimerais te la montrer, pour que tu me croies. Ça a l'air tellement douloureux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>Promise me you will be careful. That you will seek my counsel if you feel unwell.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003420_YSHTOLA<tab>Tout ce que je te demande, c'est de prendre plus soin de toi. Et tu ne dois pas hésiter à te confier quand quelque chose ne va pas<var 1D /var>! C'est compris<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>That puts my heart at ease, if only a touch. I suspect it will grow colder as the night wears on, so do be sure to stay warm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003430_YSHTOLA<tab>Bien, me voilà rassurée. Ah, j'allais oublier<var 1D /var>! Les nuits sont fraîches à Sharlayan, alors pense à bien te couvrir avant de dormir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Sleep well, and may the shadows keep you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003440_YSHTOLA<tab>Allin tuta... Bonne nuit, mon <var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003450_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh, apologies. I-I didn't mean to... Ahem. If you could spare a moment before bed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003450_GRAHATIA<tab>Ah, euh... Excuse-moi de te dérrranger<var 1D /var>! Tu veux bien qu'on parle, juste un peu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>Thank you. I fear this may be the last quiet night we have to talk for quite some time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003460_GRAHATIA<tab>Ouf<var 1D /var>! Je me disais que ça serait peut-être la derrrnière occasion de discuter comme ça, tous les deux...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>I am...troubled, of late. Unwarranted concerns, perhaps. I hope. Nevertheless, I feel compelled to share them with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003470_GRAHATIA<tab>Je voudrais te faire part d'une pensée qui me tracasse. Si je me fais des idées, tant mieux, mais j'ai vrrraiment besoin de vider mon sac.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>Though you have bested your enemies thus far─Zenos, and even Zodiark─your victories have come at a considerable cost to yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003480_GRAHATIA<tab>Il y a d'abord Zenos, qui a fait tellement de victimes juste pour t'affronter. Et puis ton combat contre Zordiarche. Tout ce poids que tu porrrtes sur tes épaules...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>No one is without their limits─and you are no exception. I worry the added weight of the Final Days will prove more than you can bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003490_GRAHATIA<tab>D'autant plus avec l'apocalypse qui approche, j'imagine à peine la pression que tu dois endurer. J'ai peurrr qu'à un moment, tu finisses par craquer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>It is surely too much for any one <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>Ce que j'essaye de te dirrre, c'est que...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>But you needn't bear it alone. Let me share your burden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003510_GRAHATIA<tab>Tu n'es pas <var 08 E905 ((toute seule)) ((tout seul)) /var>. J'ai voulu que tu vives, que tu sois à mes côtés... Alors tu as le droit de te rrreposer sur moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>My, um...carrying capacity pales in comparison to yours, but I could still help. Shoulder the occasional satchel from your ever-growing mountain of, um...baggage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003520_GRAHATIA<tab>Bien sûr, je ne suis pas aussi forrrt que toi. Mais il n'empêche que je ne vais pas te lâcher, alors autant me rendre utile en chemin, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>You have already done so much to help relieve me of mine own encumbrances. 'Tis only fair that I repay you in kind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003530_GRAHATIA<tab>Je ne me suis jamais senti aussi bien qu'aujourd'hui, et ça, c'est entièrement grrrâce à toi. Donc si jamais tu as besoin de moi, n'hésite pas une seconde, car je serai prêt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>Of course, it needn't be only troubles we share.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003540_GRAHATIA<tab>L'amitié, c'est aussi bien dans la joie que dans la peine, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>Moments of joy may seem few and far between now, but there will come a time when we look back fondly on this journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003550_GRAHATIA<tab>La vie n'est pas toujours facile, mais je sais qu'au bout de la route, je me rrrappellerai les épisodes vécus ensemble comme des moments merveilleux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>The inquiry at the Forum, our march through the snows of Garlemald, our impromptu dinner in this very room─all of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003560_GRAHATIA<tab>Notre passage en audience disciplinaire, notre périple sur les routes enneigées, et même le dîner parrrtagé dans cette chambre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003570_GRAHATIA<tab>And that is to say nothing of the journeys yet to come. To the ends of the world and beyond!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003570_GRAHATIA<tab>Des souvenirs comme ça, on en a encore plein à construirrre ensemble. Tu as bien dit que tu m'emmènerais à l'aventure avec toi, alors tu as intérêt à tenir parole<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003580_GRAHATIA<tab>Ahem. But tomorrow will be no less busy than today, and I have kept you from your rest long enough.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003580_GRAHATIA<tab>Voilà que je m'emballe, alors que tu étais <var 08 E905 ((censée)) ((censé)) /var> te rrreposer... Encore désolé, je ne vais pas t'embêter plus longtemps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003590_GRAHATIA<tab>Sleep well, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003590_GRAHATIA<tab>Bonne nuit mon <var 08 E905 ((amie)) ((ami)) /var>, fais de beaux rrrêves.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003600_ESTINIEN<tab>You're alone... Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003600_ESTINIEN<tab>Bonsoir. Tu as une minute<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003610_ESTINIEN<tab>The twins thought now would be a wonderful time to pay a visit to my chambers. Rather than listen to them bicker over tonight's snacks and tomorrow's plans, I seized the first opportunity to make my escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003610_ESTINIEN<tab>Alphinaud et Alisaie sont passés me voir dans ma chambre. “Il faut que tu manges”, “tu devrais te reposer”, bla bla bla...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>To their credit, they decided against intruding on your peace and quiet.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003620_ESTINIEN<tab>Ils m'ont tellement pris la tête que j'ai préféré m'éclipser. Ça a l'air plus calme ici, ça me va mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>It can all be a bit...exhausting at times, can't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003630_ESTINIEN<tab>Vous faites quand même une sacrée équipe, toi et tes amis.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>I wasn't sure what to make of you at first. During the Dragonsong War, how quick you were to take up a cause not your own. But I came to see that is simply the way of you and yours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003640_ESTINIEN<tab>C'était déjà le cas pendant la Guerre du chant des dragons, mais vous aimez décidément vous jeter dans les difficultés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003650_ESTINIEN<tab>I will not pretend to understand this talk of ancient primals and the Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003650_ESTINIEN<tab>Pour être honnête avec toi, je ne comprends pas tout à vos histoires de Primordiaux anciens ou de fin du monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003660_ESTINIEN<tab>But I trust in your judgment and choose to believe in your cause. You and Alphinaud have my lance. Now and always.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003660_ESTINIEN<tab>Mais quand j'ai vu à quel point Alphinaud... à quel point <var 1A 02 /var>vous tous<var 1A 01 /var> étiez déterminés, j'ai décidé de mettre ma lance à votre service.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003670_ESTINIEN<tab>You will need it, wrack and ruin looming on the horizon. Calamity bearing down upon us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003670_ESTINIEN<tab>Tant que vous aurez besoin de moi, je serai là. Quelles que soient les épreuves à surmonter dans le combat qui nous attend, je lutterai jusqu'au bout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003680_ESTINIEN<tab>There's no place I'd rather be than here. Standing shoulder to shoulder with friends on the front line.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003680_ESTINIEN<tab>Et... je veux que ce soit bien clair entre nous. Si je suis ici aujourd'hui, c'est de ma propre volonté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>So do not hesitate to send me against your enemies. I'll make them rue the day they met me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003690_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu peux donc compter sur moi pour me battre. Amène-moi n'importe quel ennemi, aussi puissant soit-il, il regrettera de s'être mis en travers de notre chemin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003700_ESTINIEN<tab>Now, if you'll excuse me. I could do with a little air.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003700_ESTINIEN<tab>Bon... Si tu veux bien m'excuser, je ne fais que passer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003710_ESTINIEN<tab>If Alphinaud asks... I was never here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003710_ESTINIEN<tab>Si Alphinaud ou les autres me cherchent, tu leur diras que tu ne m'as pas vu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003720_ESTINIEN<tab>Until the morrow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003720_ESTINIEN<tab>Salut, camarade.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003730_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>A short while earlier, in the Ala Mhigan Quarter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003730_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Un peu plus tôt, au Faubourg mhigois

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Thank the gods that tower is gone. The sight of it was enough to make me sick...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Je ne suis pas mécontente que cette tour sinistre ait disparu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003750_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Thank the Ilsabard Contingent, more like. Word is they fought their way into Garlemald and toppled the bloody thing themselves. Not just the one, neither─all the towers have up and vanished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003750_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Il paraît que la délégation d'Ilsabard s'est occupée de la source du mal dans la capitale impériale. Du coup, toutes les tours se sont évaporées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003760_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Aye, I heard the same. Commander Aldynn and his troops helped keep casualties to a minimum, too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003760_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Tant mieux. On a eu de la chance que le général Aldynn et ses alliés renforcent nos défenses, ça aurait pu être bien pire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003770_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>But is it true they brought back tempered Garlean soldiers?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003770_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>En parlant de la délégation, tu as vu tous les subjugués qu'ils ont rapatriés de Garlemald<var 1D /var>? Ça ne me dit rien qui vaille...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003780_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>As Commander Aldynn tells it, they've a treatment for that now. But don't you worry─cured or not, they've no plans to bring them into the city proper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003780_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>D'après ce que j'ai compris, les membres de l'Alliance éorzéenne vont se partager le boulot pour les soigner. On ne devrait pas en voir débarquer plus pour le moment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003790_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>I see. Well, that's a relief, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003790_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>C'est très bien comme ça. Je plains tous ces pauvres gens, mais je préfère les voir rester très loin de chez nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003800_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>I know we've brothers and sisters among the lot, but I can't say I'm eager to welcome them home...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003800_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Sans parler des Mhigois qui ont collaboré avec l'Empire... J'ai du mal à leur faire confiance après tout ce temps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003810_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Won't need to think about it for a while yet. They're to be looked after in Ala Gannha for the time being...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003810_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Je vois très bien ce que tu veux dire. Au moins, à Ala Gannha, ils ont commencé à s'organiser pour s'occuper d'eux, d'après ce que j'ai compris.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003820_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in Ishgard...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003820_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, à Ishgard

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003830_ERENVILLE<tab>Another day, another commission of paramount importance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003830_ERENVILLE<tab>Ça alors, voilà encore une demande bien audacieuse...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003840_ERENVILLE<tab>Well, what have we here...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003840_ERENVILLE<tab>Tiens, qu'est-ce qu'il a<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003850_ERENVILLE<tab>Hm?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003850_ERENVILLE<tab>... Hm<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003860_ERENVILLE<tab>Hey! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003860_ERENVILLE<tab>Hé, ça va<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003870_ERENVILLE<tab>Was that...? No. The shadows play tricks. Nothing more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003870_ERENVILLE<tab>Qu'est-ce que...<var 1D /var>! Mon imagination me joue des tours<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003880_ERENVILLE<tab>The towers are gone, and the Garlean threat has abated. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003880_ERENVILLE<tab>Les tours ont disparu, l'Empire s'est calmé, tout semble aller pour le mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003890_ERENVILLE<tab>Why does it feel as though it's about to get much, much worse...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06002_003890_ERENVILLE<tab>Et pourtant, l'air est irrespirable... Qu'est-ce qui se prépare encore<var 1D /var>?
